Episodes.Title: Downsize
Episodes.Plot: David Brent, manager of the Slough branch of Wernham Hogg paper merchants, is told that it might be closed down. He makes the rash promise of No Redundancies...
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Work Experience
Episodes.Plot: A new girl arrives on work experience. The day is brightened up even more by a doctored picture of David Brent that's been e-mailed around the office. Cue Gareth Keenan Special Investigator...
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: The Quiz
Episodes.Plot: Tim is 30 today and receives some special gifts. Dawn wants to organize after-work drinks for him but it's also the annual quiz night. Brent & Finchy see it as a point of honour that they win. The only real competition comes from Tim & Ricky...
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Training
Episodes.Plot: Wernham Hogg, Slough branch are having a training day. Rowan, an outside consultant tries his best.  Dawn has other things on her mind...
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Vincent Franklin, Peter Purves, Richard Hollis, Lucy O'Connel

Episodes.Title: New Girl
Episodes.Plot: Brent decides to take on a new secretary despite the spectre of redundancies in the Slough branch. He can choose between some bloke that's turned up for interview and a pretty young blonde. The day is rounded off with a trip to Chasers nightclub...
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Kiki Kendrick, Ellen Collier, Robin Ince, Tiffany Stevenson-Oake, Nicola Cotter

Episodes.Title: Judgement
Episodes.Plot: Jennifer arrives to give the final decision. The Slough branch is to be merged with Swindon and some people will lose their jobs, and Dave has been offered Jennifer's job, which he accepts.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Neil Fitzmaurice, Dick Bradnum, Ron Merchant, Nicola Cotter
